title: Evolve and Flex with Lance Fresh
overview: Evolve and Flex with sports-lifestyle host and style guru Lance Fresh is a series that dives deep into personal fashion journeys, uncovering how life experiences have shaped and transformed each guest's style evolution. The show highlights pivotal moments and influences that have impacted their fashion choices, offering a fresh perspective on how life and fashion intersect -- while also showcasing the powerful connection between sports and style.
